snippet.title: Dot Piece Puzzle - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
https://hiyori-prd.com/dpp/en/

- What is Dot Piece Puzzle ......?
Let's collect cute dot pictures of "Animals" and "Foods" such as penguins and cats!
Assemble the colorful dot pieces to complete the dot picture.
 
- How to play Dot Piece Puzzle
This is a simple puzzle in which you fit the scattered dot pieces together using a model dot picture as a guide.
There are a total of 31 different dot-pixel patterns based on the themes of "Animals" and "Food".
There are more than 120 ways to play the puzzles, starting with easy puzzles and progressing to more difficult patterns as the game progresses.
 
- Android™ devices on which you can play
You can play on both smartphones and tablets.
 
- Multilingual support
Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish, German, French, and Italian are supported. The language of puzzle names and messages can be changed from the options.

- Developer's Comment
I wanted to play with puzzles that were like completing a dot illustration, so I made this puzzle.
You can solve the puzzles in any way you like, by snapping the puzzle together at random, or by carefully observing the differences in color. It takes a long time to solve all the puzzles!
We are happy if you like the atmosphere of the application and play it.
